name: Physics Puzzle Idle
description:
Are you fast enough? Test out your action and reaction speed as you tap your way to success in Physics Puzzle Idle – the ultimate idle ball game.

In Physics Puzzle Idle, you are the master of construction, speed and success. The faster you tap, the faster those balls will roll and make it to their destination. And that means coin, baby!

Levers, gears, slides, dominos, drops, and more are all that stand between you and your goal.

Create the path to idle games victory!

Release those balls into your tailored mechanism and watch as they travel along the route. Will they make it? Or will you have to start the game all over again? The challenge is in your hands.

Can you become a ball tycoon? Every time you get a ball into the hole, you get more coins. And that coin means you can upgrade your ball-moving mechanism – add more parts for even more fun!

In this exciting balling game, triumph is at your fingertips. So, keep up the turbo and tap, tap, tap your path to success!

Download Physics Puzzle Idle and play the ultimate idle game of games!
